exceptions.exn: In environment b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat b := Z.of_nat b_nat : Z The term "2" has type "Z" while it is expected to have type "nat".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall p : Z, Znumtheory.prime p -> 2 <= p" on hypothesis of type "(2 <= b_nat)%nat".

In environment H1 : forall p : nat, prime p -> (2 <= p)%nat H0 : forall n m p : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n <= p)%nat b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat Unable to unify "(2 <= b_nat)%nat" with "2 <= Z.of_nat b_nat".

In environment H2 : forall p : nat, prime p -> (2 <= p)%nat H : forall n m p : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n <= p)%nat b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat Unable to unify "0 <= 2" with "2 <= Z.of_nat b_nat".

original: apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= 2). - apply Znumtheory.prime_ge_2 in Hb_nat. apply Hb_nat. - apply Z.le_0_2.
